question: Former RBI Deputy governor R Gandhi and Ananth Narayan have been appointed on the board of which Indian bank?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has appointed former RBI Deputy Governor R Gandhi and former banker Ananth Narayan on the board of Yes Bank.
They have been appointed as Additional directors on the board for two years. Ananth Narayan was serving as the regional head of financial markets in the Standard Chartered Bank. R Gandhi was earlier appointed to Yes Bankâ€™s board last year. Prashant Kumar has been appointed Chief Executive of Yes Bank.
